mainMenu.greeting: Podcast Hotline. Press 1 for weather forecast, 2 for NPR News, 3 for This American Life, 4 for The Daily, 5 for Serial, 6 for Matt Walsh, 7 for Ben Shapiro, 8 for Michael Knowles, 9 for Andrew Klavan, 10 for Pints with Aquinas, 11 for Joe Rogan, 12 for Jordan Peterson, 13 for Crowder, 14 for Lex Fridman, 15 for TimCast IRL, 18 for Bible Thinker, 20 for Morning Wire, 21 for Jimmy Akin, 90 to leave feedback, or star to repeat.
mainMenu.noResponse: We didn't receive your selection. Please call back and try again.

systemTest.success: System test successful. The integration is working properly.

weather.introduction: Enter your 5-digit zipcode followed by pound.
weather.noZipcodeReceived: I did not receive your zipcode. Returning to main menu.
weather.invalidZipcode: Sorry, that does not appear to be a valid 5-digit zipcode. Please try again.
weather.unavailable: Sorry, I was unable to get weather information at this time. Please try again later.
weather.zipcodeNotFound: Sorry, I couldn't find weather information for zipcode {zipcode}. Please make sure you entered a valid US zipcode.
weather.options: Press 1 to hear the forecast again, 2 for a different zipcode, or any other key to return to the main menu.
weather.repeatPrompt: Please enter your zipcode again to hear the forecast.
weather.welcomeBack: Your zipcode is {zipcode}. Press 1 to continue, or 2 for different zipcode.
weather.adMessage: This weather report is brought to you by our sponsor.

podcasts.noEpisodes: Sorry, no episodes are available for {podcastName} right now. Please try another podcast.
podcasts.technicalIssue: Sorry, there's a technical issue with {podcastName}. Please try another podcast or call back later.
podcasts.streamingUnavailable: This episode features {episodeTitle}. Unfortunately, the audio stream is not compatible with the phone system. Please try NPR option 2 for reliable streaming.
podcasts.playbackControls: Press 1 for previous, 3 for next, 4 to skip back, 6 to skip forward, or 0 for menu.
podcasts.pressAnyKey: Press any key to return to the main menu.

errors.general: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again.
errors.timeout: {podcastName} is taking longer than usual to load. Please try again in a moment or select another podcast.
errors.unavailable: Sorry, this episode is temporarily unavailable. Trying next episode.

navigation.repeatMenu: Press star to repeat the menu.

feedback.introduction: Welcome to the feedback line. Please leave your message after the tone. Press any key when finished, or hang up to automatically save.
feedback.recording: Recording your message now. Speak clearly.
feedback.saving: Thank you for your feedback. Your message is being saved and transcribed.
feedback.saved: Your feedback has been saved successfully. Thank you for helping us improve.
feedback.error: Sorry, there was a problem saving your feedback. Please try again later.
feedback.tooShort: Your message was too short. Please try again with more detail.
feedback.tooLong: Your message is getting long. Please wrap up your feedback.
feedback.transcribing: Your message is being transcribed. This may take a moment.
feedback.transcriptionComplete: Transcription complete. Your feedback has been logged.

notes: All prompts use British voice (Polly.Brian) with en-GB language
Variables in {curly braces} are replaced dynamically
Keep prompts concise for phone delivery
Avoid complex punctuation that might affect speech synthesis
Podcast playback at 1.25x speed through proxy endpoint for faster listening

voiceSettings.description: British male voice for professional podcast hotline
